exploreMoreDescription: Discover our full range of premium vitamins and supplements
aboutContent: Highly effective vitamin B2 (riboflavin) 250 mg per vegan-friendly capsule - each capsule contains 250 mg of vitamin B2, providing 180 servings (6 months supply). Vitamin B2 supports the body in converting food into energy and maintaining healthy skin, eyes and nervous system. While our body produces some riboflavin, it's not enough to meet daily needs. Our supplements are GMO free, GMP compliant, and manufactured in certified facilities meeting strict EU/UK regulations. Includes a satisfaction guarantee.
descriptionContent: Nutriota Vitamin B2 capsules are ideal for supplementing your diet with this essential helper vitamin that helps gain energy from food. Found naturally in milk, eggs, meat and leafy vegetables, vitamin B2 (riboflavin) acts as a protective vitamin for our cells, supporting skin, eyes and nerve health. Each bottle contains 180 capsules manufactured in a GMP compliant facility, providing 250 mg vitamin B2 per serving to ensure your body is adequately supplied with this vital nutrient.
ingredientsContent: Riboflavin (vitamin B2), rice flour, capsule shell (coating agent: hydroxypropylmethylcellulose).
informationContent: Units: 108.0 gram | Brand: Nutriota | Format: Capsule
